1.0.0.name: wordpress/float-banner
1.0.0.description:
Float Left Right Advertising can scroll up/down banner when user scroll page up/down. Support HTML, image, flash. Multi options. Thank http://gamechodt.com and http://taiphanmemdt.com help me completed this plugin.

Features:

  • Can scroll up/down banner when user scroll page up/down
  • Multi options
